posts.post_content:
Auction win from a reputable house last year.  Red Hindu Ford - was laminated at some point in the past.  It has been in lucite on display in a dark room recently.  $400 with insurance/tracking.  Add $5 for lucite mailed with it.  Paypal or venmo.

[IMG]https://vintagepaper.store/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/3E9A236D-B2F2-4E32-A119-9DFE94BB01F4-scaled.jpeg[/IMG][IMG]https://vintagepaper.store/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/2D1D8F47-2EAF-42E5-AB0E-1CCD5FFD414F-scaled.jpeg[/IMG]
What if I want to buy just the lucite?
